channel.title: The New Yorker — Reporting
channel.description: Latest reporting from The New Yorker

item.title: The Family Fallout of DNA Surprises
item.description: Through genetic testing, millions of Americans are estimated to have discovered that their parents aren’t who they thought. The news has upended relationships and created a community looking for answers.

item.title: Bill Belichick Goes Back to School
item.description: Can the legendary former Patriots coach transform U.N.C. football?

item.title: Pam Bondi’s Power Play
item.description: Donald Trump now has the Attorney General he always wanted—an ally willing to harness the law to enable his agenda.

item.title: The Otherworldly Ambitions of R. F. Kuang
item.description: The author of “Babel” and “Yellowface” is drawn to stories of striving. Her new fantasy novel, “Katabasis,” asks if graduate school is a kind of hell.

item.title: A24’s Empire of Auteurs
item.description: The studio is brilliant at selling small, provocative films. Now it wants to sell blockbusters, too.

item.title: The History of The New Yorker’s Vaunted Fact-Checking Department
item.description: Reporters engage in charm and betrayal; checkers are in the harm-reduction business.

item.title: How a Billionaire Owner Brought Turmoil and Trouble to Sotheby’s
item.description: Patrick Drahi made a fortune through debt-fuelled telecommunications companies. Now he’s bringing his methods to the art market.

item.title: Patricia Lockwood Goes Viral
item.description: The writer’s new novel, “Will There Ever Be Another You,” is a singular account of losing her mind, body, and art toCOVID—and of trying to get them back.

item.title: A.I. Is Coming for Culture
item.description: We’re used to algorithms guiding our choices. When machines can effortlessly generate the content we consume, though, what’s left for the human imagination?

item.title: The Mysterious Cover Artist Who Captured the Decline of the Rich
item.description: Mary Petty was reclusive, uncompromising, but she peered into a fading world with unmatched warmth and brilliance.
